meanings.definition: The quality or state of being harmonious.
meanings.sent1: The harmoniousness of the music brought peace to my soul.
meanings.sent2: The garden's harmoniousness was evident in its colorful flowers and lush greenery.
meanings.sent3: The harmoniousness of the team's dance routine made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The harmoniousness of nature's symphony filled the air with tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The harmoniousness of the choir's voices resonated beautifully in the hall.

meanings.definition: The pleasing arrangement of parts in a whole.
meanings.sent1: The harmoniousness of the painting captivated the viewers.
meanings.sent2: The architect achieved harmoniousness in the design of the building.
meanings.sent3: The harmoniousness of the puzzle pieces fit together perfectly.
meanings.sent4: The harmoniousness of flavors in the dish created a delightful taste.
meanings.sent5: The harmoniousness of colors in the room created a peaceful atmosphere.
